nodes.text: Mish Paht was a male Bothan, who was a Lieutenant in the Thaereian military during the time of the Clone Wars.
In about 21 BBY, Paht led a group of soldiers to the city of Ipsus, on Genarius, where he attempted to arrest the Heroes of Cularin, who had captured a prisoner that the Thaereians wanted custody of.

Paht was aggressive and ambitious. He believed that he could go far in the Thaereian military, so he convinced himself and the troops that served under him, that he could achieve promotion through violent means.
